title: Internet Connection Troubleshoot
description: Fix 'No Internet Access', wifi disconnected, and general connectivity failures.

steps.title: Check Physical Connection
steps.instruction: If on Ethernet, replug the cable. If on Wifi, toggle it Off and On. Ensure Airplane mode is Disabled.

steps.title: Restart Your Device
steps.instruction: Restart your computer/laptop. This clears the network stack and resolves 80% of transient connection bugs.

steps.title: Renew IP Address
steps.instruction: Open CMD/Terminal. Type 'ipconfig /release' then 'ipconfig /renew'. This forces your router to assign a new local IP.

steps.title: Flush DNS Cache
steps.instruction: Open CMD/Terminal as Admin. Type 'ipconfig /flushdns'. This clears corrupted website address records.

steps.title: Check Proxy Settings
steps.instruction: Search for 'Proxy Settings' in Windows/Mac. Ensure 'Use a proxy server' is OFF unless specifically required by your IT team.
